main event: A bright, hovering light was observed over Boyertown, Pennsylvania on April 9, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as pulsating and changing color from white to red to green.
The object appeared to stop and hover at times.
The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes.
No sound was associated with the object.
An investigator from Project Blue Book was dispatched to conduct an on-site investigation.
sighted object: a bright, pulsating light in the sky
witnesses: Mr. Charles A. Howe and his wife
